# Rise and Battle the Day
## Scripture
"Put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to stand against the schemes of the devil." â€“ Ephesians 6:11
## Reflection
As men, we are often called to face challenges and opposition that can be daunting and overwhelming. But as Christians, we have a powerful ally in our battle: the armor of God. This armor is not just a physical suit of armor, but a spiritual one that gives us the strength and protection we need to stand firm against the enemy's schemes. In Ephesians 6, Paul reminds us of the different pieces of armor that we need to put on, including the belt of truth, the breastplate of righteousness, and the shield of faith. As we put on this armor, we are reminded that our battle is not against flesh and blood, but against the spiritual forces of darkness. So let us rise up, put on our armor, and battle the day with courage and confidence in our Lord.

## Daily Challenge
"Do 25 burpees while praying for God to give you strength and courage to face your battles today."
